title: How to Set Best Drift Tuning in Need for Speed: Underground 2

steps.title: Go to Garage --> Performance Tuning/Dyno --> Drift --> Tune Settings.
steps.content: Go to Garage --> Performance Tuning/Dyno --> Drift --> Tune Settings.

steps.title: Go to Suspension, set {Front & Rear Lowering} and (Front & Rear Shocks) in {High} & (Hard), set [Front & Rear Spring and Front & Rear Sway Bar] in [Soft].
steps.content: Go to Suspension, set {Front & Rear Lowering} and (Front & Rear Shocks) in {High} & (Hard), set [Front & Rear Spring and Front & Rear Sway Bar] in [Soft].

steps.title: Go to Drive train, set Final "Drive Train" in to "Max.
steps.content: Go to Drive train, set Final "Drive Train" in to "Max. Acceleration".

steps.title: Go to Aerodynamics, set in Strong (All).
steps.content: Go to Aerodynamics, set in Strong (All).

steps.title: Go to Tire and Brakes, set in 0.00 (All).
steps.content: Go to Tire and Brakes, set in 0.00 (All).
